FreeTier.description: The possible customizable free tier configurations.

resource.description: A markup/discount that is defined for a specific set of services that can later be associated with a pricing plan.

properties.name: BillingEntity
properties.description: The seller of services provided by AWS, their affiliates, or third-party providers selling services via AWS Marketplaces. Supported billing entities are AWS, AWS Marketplace, and AISPL.

type.description: The seller of services provided by AWS, their affiliates, or third-party providers selling services via AWS Marketplaces. Supported billing entities are AWS, AWS Marketplace, and AISPL.

properties.name: Operation
properties.description: The Operation which a SKU pricing rule is modifying

type.description: The Operation which a SKU pricing rule is modifying

properties.name: Scope
properties.description: A term used to categorize the granularity of a Pricing Rule.

type.description: A term used to categorize the granularity of a Pricing Rule.

properties.name: Service
properties.description: The service which a pricing rule is applied on

type.description: The service which a pricing rule is applied on

properties.name: Tiering
properties.description: The set of tiering configurations for the pricing rule.

type.description: The set of tiering configurations for the pricing rule.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: One of MARKUP, DISCOUNT or TIERING that describes the behaviour of the pricing rule.

type.description: One of MARKUP, DISCOUNT or TIERING that describes the behaviour of the pricing rule.

properties.name: UsageType
properties.description: The UsageType which a SKU pricing rule is modifying

type.description: The UsageType which a SKU pricing rule is modifying

attributes.description: A markup/discount that is defined for a specific set of services that can later be associated with a pricing plan.

properties.name: AssociatedPricingPlanCount
properties.description: The number of pricing plans associated with pricing rule

type.description: The number of pricing plans associated with pricing rule

properties.name: CreationTime
properties.description: Creation timestamp in UNIX epoch time format

type.description: Creation timestamp in UNIX epoch time format

properties.name: LastModifiedTime
properties.description: Latest modified timestamp in UNIX epoch time format

type.description: Latest modified timestamp in UNIX epoch time format
